channel.title: CVE Feed for MICRONET CORPORATION -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for MICRONET CORPORATION -- all products

item.title: CVE-2018-0671|2024-08-05T03:35:48.981Z -- micronet%20corporation -- inplc-rt
item.description: Privilege escalation vulnerability in INplc-RT 3.08 and earlier allows an attacker with administrator rights to execute arbitrary code on the Windows system via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2018-0670|2024-08-05T03:35:48.938Z -- micronet%20corporation -- inplc-rt
item.description: INplc-RT 3.08 and earlier allows remote attackers to bypass authentication to execute an arbitrary command through the protocol-compliant traffic. This is a different vulnerability than CVE-2018-0669.

item.title: CVE-2018-0669|2024-08-05T03:35:49.003Z -- micronet%20corporation -- inplc-rt
item.description: INplc-RT 3.08 and earlier allows remote attackers to bypass authentication to execute an arbitrary command through the protocol-compliant traffic. This is a different vulnerability than CVE-2018-0670.

item.title: CVE-2018-0667|2024-08-05T03:35:49.090Z -- micronet%20corporation -- installer%20of%20inplc%20sdk%20express%203.08%20and%20earlier%20and%20installer%20of%20inplc%20sdk%20pro%2B%203.08%20and%20earlier
item.description: Untrusted search path vulnerability in Installer of INplc SDK Express 3.08 and earlier and Installer of INplc SDK Pro+ 3.08 and earlier allows an attacker to gain privileges via a Trojan horse DLL in an unspecified directory.

item.title: CVE-2018-0668|2024-08-05T03:35:48.930Z -- micronet%20corporation -- inplc-rt
item.description: Buffer overflow in INplc-RT 3.08 and earlier allows remote attackers to cause denial-of-service (DoS) condition that may result in executing arbtrary code via unspecified vectors.
